alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Orange; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:53PM EDT until June 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alamance County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Orange County in central North Carolina... Davidson County in central North Carolina... Northern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Reidsville to near Greensboro to 6 miles southeast of Clemmons to 8 miles southeast of Harmony, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Winston-Salem, High Point, Burlington, Lexington, Graham, Randleman, Thomasville, Kernersville and Clemmons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Orange; Randolph
